code:
var pitchText = 'So why game design? Well, have you ever been disappointed by a class you were really excited about? It probably wasn’t the course content that bored you; it more likely had something to do with how your experience as a student was crafted: Were the assignments too hard or too easy? Were there not enough different ways to engage the material? Did the physical space of the classroom not fit the activities the class engaged in?';
export default pitchText;

sourcesContent:
const pitchText = 'So why game design? Well, have you ever been disappointed by a class you were really excited about? It probably wasn’t the course content that bored you; it more likely had something to do with how your experience as a student was crafted: Were the assignments too hard or too easy? Were there not enough different ways to engage the material? Did the physical space of the classroom not fit the activities the class engaged in?'

export default pitchText;
